summary: A unit-test collection that validates the configuration, encoding functionality, core model operations, and various save/load mechanisms (including BF16 precision and base model conversions) for the Flax T5 encoder‑only architecture.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, compatibility, and deployability of the Flax T5 encoder‑only model across different versions and serialization formats, supporting reliable integration in machine‑learning pipelines.
